title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Strive to enjoy a pleasure without the guilt today. Theres no need to blame yourself if you willingly choose to act against your goals or interests. However, any pushback from your conscience might be telling you something else. The real issue could be the reason behind why youre sabotaging your dreams. This type of self-defeating behavior comes from only loving pieces of yourself rather than the whole, which is not a long-term sustainable strategy. Meditating on your own, confiding in a discreet friend, or working with a therapist can help you see yourself in a more positive light. Ripples of kindness start from within. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
